name: HDMI to SRT with Audio
pipeline: v4l2src device=/dev/vdin1 ! video/x-raw,format=NV12,width=1920,height=1080,framerate=60/1 ! queue ! aml_h264enc bitrate=20000000 profile=high ! h264parse ! mux. alsasrc device=hw:0,0 ! audio/x-raw,rate=48000,channels=2 ! queue ! audioconvert ! faac bitrate=128000 ! aacparse ! mux. mpegtsmux name=mux ! srtsink uri="srt://0.0.0.0:5000?mode=listener"
